Package org.cyclops.integratedterminals.core.terminalstorage

Class TerminalStorageTabIngredientComponentClient<T,M>

java.lang.Object
org.cyclops.integratedterminals.core.terminalstorage.TerminalStorageTabIngredientComponentClient<T,M>
Type Parameters:
T - The instance type.
M - The matching condition parameter.
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITerminalStorageTabClient<TerminalStorageSlotIngredient<T,M>>
Direct Known Subclasses:
TerminalStorageTabIngredientComponentItemStackCraftingClient
public class TerminalStorageTabIngredientComponentClient<T,M> extends Object implements ITerminalStorageTabClient<TerminalStorageSlotIngredient<T,M>>
A client-side storage terminal ingredient tab.

    • handleClick

      public boolean handleClick(net.minecraft.world.inventory.AbstractContainerMenu container, int channel, int hoveringStorageSlot, int mouseButton, boolean hasClickedOutside, boolean hasClickedInStorage, int hoveredContainerSlot)
      Description copied from interface: ITerminalStorageTabClient
      Called when a mouse click happens in a gui.
      Specified by:
      handleClick in interface ITerminalStorageTabClient<T>
      Parameters:
      container - The active container.
      channel - The active channel.
      hoveringStorageSlot - The storage slot id that is being hovered. -1 if none.
      mouseButton - The mouse button.
      hasClickedOutside - If the player has clicked outside the gui.
      hasClickedInStorage - If the player has clicked inside the storage space. This can be true even if the storage slot is -1.
      hoveredContainerSlot - The container slot id that is being hovered. -1 if none.
      Returns:
      If further click processing should stop.

    • handleScroll

      public boolean handleScroll(net.minecraft.world.inventory.AbstractContainerMenu container, int channel, int hoveringStorageSlot, double delta, boolean hasClickedOutside, boolean hasClickedInStorage, int hoveredContainerSlot)
      Description copied from interface: ITerminalStorageTabClient
      Called when a mouse scroll happens in a gui.
      Specified by:
      handleScroll in interface ITerminalStorageTabClient<T>
      Parameters:
      container - The active container.
      channel - The active channel.
      hoveringStorageSlot - The storage slot id that is being hovered. -1 if none.
      delta - The scroll delta.
      hasClickedOutside - If the player has clicked outside the gui.
      hasClickedInStorage - If the player has clicked inside the storage space. This can be true even if the storage slot is -1.
      hoveredContainerSlot - The container slot id that is being hovered. -1 if none.
      Returns:
      If further click processing should stop.

      public int computeDraggingQuantity(Set<net.minecraft.world.inventory.Slot> dragSlots, int dragMode, net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack stack, int quantity)
      Description copied from interface: ITerminalStorageTabClient
      Calculate the quantity that will be added to the given stack based on the drag mode and the given list of slots.
      Specified by:
      computeDraggingQuantity in interface ITerminalStorageTabClient<T>
      Parameters:
      dragSlots - The list of slots to drag over.
      dragMode - The drag mode.
      stack - The stack to calculate the quantity for.
      quantity - The available quantity to drag.

    • dragIntoSlot

      public int dragIntoSlot(net.minecraft.world.inventory.AbstractContainerMenu container, int channel, net.minecraft.world.inventory.Slot slot, int quantity, boolean simulate)
      Description copied from interface: ITerminalStorageTabClient
      Drag the given quantity into the given slot with the currently active instance.
      Specified by:
      dragIntoSlot in interface ITerminalStorageTabClient<T>
      Parameters:
      container - The active container.
      channel - The active channel.
      slot - The slot to drag into.
      quantity - The quantity to insert.
      simulate - If insertion should only be simulated.
      Returns:
      The quantity that was inserted.
